Job DescriptionETC is a leader in the tolling and transportation space. We know that doesnt sound like an innovative company but stay with us. We are pushing the boundaries with vision-based tracking, IoT devices, ML, and the use of cloud technologies. We design systems that deploy thousands of sensors in harsh conditions that send data in real-time to a cloud system. From there, we clean, correlate, and price those sensor outputs. We build machine-learning systems that evaluate every license plate. All of these systems must run 24x7 with zero outages because hundreds of users get free access toto the system every minute it is down.You get to do that while working from home, or anywhere you want, and having a flexible schedule. We offer an environment where you can make a real difference in what we do. Our technology leadership started in our intern program. We promote and train from within. Do you think you can do it better than we already do it? Come and show us.Job SummaryThis position includes the following duties. Other duties may be assigned to meet business needs.Essential FunctionsTop technical staff or Subject Matter Expert for enterprise level solutions.Teaches technical topics to junior and other senior members of the staff.Facilitates technical issue resolution across technical areas.Promotes adherence to and continuedly improvement to the corporate programming standards and Enterprise Architecture Standards.Oversight and continuous improvement to detailed code-reviews.Provide strategic direction defining and designing business processes and help identify technologies to meet business requirements.Actively work with product team to apply new development to business processes; research and provide information concerning technical solutions and competitors' practices relevant to the customer's business.Lead solutioning/design sessions with a program perspective in association with all interdependent systems.Provide leadership in key interactions with business customers to define, analyze, and deliver customer requirements.Provide leadership as a communications liaison between the business customer and the technology development and support groups.Ability to communicate and report statuses to executive staff.Develop time estimates for project schedules, monitor progress and provide accurate and timely reports.Plan and manage project activities within allocated resources.Work across projects to synchronize data analysis efforts and deliverables.Support the organizations project management policy, practice, and methodology.Research and recommend alternative actions for problem resolution.Analyze, design, develop and test viable solutions for high complexity business problems according to user specifications and develops detail program specifications.Evaluate and recommend emerging technologies and influence technical designs.Provide leadership for system, performance, and acceptance testing.Define testing and implementation techniques that preserve system integrity.Provide oversight to ensure that systems are functionally appropriate, technically sound, and well-integrated.Provide technical support for the production support.Identify and recommend process or system enhancements for business customer.Develop cost and benefit analysis for product enhancement and new business development.Ability to execute BD (business development) writing assignments, pricing exercises, and participate in BD demonstration.Support requirements, design, system testing and interface integration workshops with business customers.CompetenciesProvides leadership and coaching for team.Able to assign and manage tasks for project.Influence and set corporate direction for software development practice, concepts, technology, and methodology obtained through formal training, and work experienceTechnical Expert of required programming languages.Expert of technical/business environments.Excellent partnering, communication, and negotiation skills so as to effectively serve as a lead liaison between business customers and technology development and support groups.Ability to provide leadership across multiple technology areas, to complete root-cause analysis, design solutions, write code, perform testing, provide documentation, and implement large/multiple development projects.Ability to coach the technical development of less experience Software Engineers.Ability to analyze and resolve multiple complex problems.Ability to lead projects using the organizations project management methodology.Ability to work effectively in a strong customer service/team-oriented environment.Use logic and reasoning to identify the strengths and weaknesses of alternative solutions, conclusions, or approaches to problems.Troubleshooting the causes of issues and deciding what to do about it.Understand the implications of new information for both current and future problem-solving and decision-making.Consider the relative costs and benefits of potential actions to choose the most appropriate one.Determine how a system should work and how changes in conditions, operations, and the environment will affect outcomes.Identify measures or indicators of system performance and the actions needed to improve or correct performance, relative to the goals of the system.Required ExperienceGraduated with a Bachelors degree program in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Software Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or Information Technology with 7-10 years of applicable related experience OR possesses 10+ years of applicable related experience.Experienced technical lead.Have a good problem-solving acumen.BenefitsETC offers a valuable benefits program designed with you and your family’s health and wellness in mind.The following is a non-exhaustive list of some of the benefits offered to full time ETC employees.12 company-paid holidays with one of those days to choose a day special to youGenerous company-sponsored 401K retirement plan with employer match with 100% vested within two yearsMedical Insurance, with Telemedicine option and a generous medical premium discountDental InsuranceVision InsurancePet InsuranceMultiple Flexible Spending Account (FSA) optionsEmployer-paid Life InsuranceShort-term and long-term disability coverageSocial, teambuilding and leadership eventsInternal career development and advancement opportunitiesEmployee Assistance Program (EAP)Legal Shield and Identity Theft ProtectionGym membership discountMilitary/Reserve LeaveEmployee Referral ProgramJury Duty and Compulsory Witness Duty time offBereavement LeaveKeyword: Principal Application Software Developer
